review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
name: Jonesy
title: It works well
review: I have used this in the past and even when I thought, oops I messed up this batch, it turned out well. For health reasons I let my yogurt process for 24 hours and it turns out tangy rather than sour. A good product.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2021
name: George in Jersey
title: The product came in different packaging than picture. This made me uncertain t
review: I was uncertain that what I received is what I have used for a year.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
name: Stephen Childress
title: Best Starter!
review: I love making yogurt and this starter never fails! It makes the best yogurt with Fairlife whole milk ...Yum!!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2021
name: Ladylux
title: Great customer service
review: The product is great. If you use only kosher, you need to find the batch with the kosher certification, because the OU stopped supervising Yogourmet. The yogurt comes out very good and thick. The customer service of this seller is MEGA-GREAT!!! ***** 5 stars! Very responsive and responsible! I recommend this product and this seller!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2021
name: cookie
title: It is the most reliable.
review: The first batch of yogurt I made with this yogurt starter was very runny.I used a bear yogurt maker. I have used in the past with other yogurt makers and itâ€™s really good. I found that the taste is good not too bitter. The thickness was good with my Yoplait yogurt maker.I have always purchased this brand and will continue purchasing it. It is the most reliable.
